CaTT- An infinity categorical coherence typechecker

CaTT is a type theory whose models are weak omega-categories, I have implemented it in OCaml. The development page for the project is available on GitHub and there is an online version available for quick tests

Formalization of representation of symmetric groups

During a research internship under the supervision of Florent Hivert, I have formalized the computation of the representations of the symmetric groups and their characters using Young tableaux, in Coq with ssreflect (now mathcomp). The project is available on GitHub, note however that it is not maintained anymore and is outdated, it has been intergrated to Florent’s development of algebraic combinatorics.
